data.text: @Suhelseth @Rupa_Books Yeah he did nothing during crisis ..he made the situation worst.he called trump and thn election rally due to which covid19 spread quickly ..people died due to lack of oxygen .this man is good for nothing ..he cant even speak two sentences with teleprompter .
@Suhelseth @Rupa_Books Insult to the lives lost gasping for oxygen....Shameful we give no value to the lives lost....but Modiji tussi great ho...
@Suhelseth @Rupa_Books Pichle Saal 'Act of God'...Is saal bemisaal Modiji....Raat ko sote kaise ho....
@raunakmahajan @Suhelseth @Rupa_Books Another pappu giving gyan ...ppl died only in india ...kuch bhi ...
@Suhelseth @Rupa_Books The cover of the book speaks the whole story
@raunakmahajan @Suhelseth @Rupa_Books Absolutely true. Any honest informed member of civil society will confirm this.

@NareshB97216792 @raunakmahajan @Suhelseth @Rupa_Books We should decouple the vaccination drive, with the actual cover management which was appalling. It was quite apparent the destruction and lack of facilities for the population. There are many aspects of vaccination which are good but there a lot of things to criticise as well
